sik.client.user.panes
Class MessagesPane

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  sik.client.user.panes.MessagesPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class MessagesPane
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Panel which is displayed as a content inside the home panel. As the home panel displays a number of different complex panels corresponding to the selected category this has been given the name 'pane' rather than 'panel'. This particular pane is is displayed when the 'Messages' button is pressed on the home panel

Author:
Jamie Brindle (06352322) - Manchester Metropolitan University
See Also:
Serialized Form
